text: ninnale bhumiyil pratinidhikalakkiyat avanan. arenkilum avisvasikkunnuvenkil a avisvasattinre deasam avanu tanneyan. satyanisedhikalkk avarute satyanisedham tannalute nathanreyatutt avanre keapamallateannum vardhippikkukayilla. satyanisedhikalkk avarute satyanisedham nastamallateannum peruppikkukayilla
